title: Book Cover, "Bookjacket by Alvin Lustig for "Exiles" by James Joyce, New Directions Books", 1947
medium: Lithography in green and black ink on off-white shiny wove paper
signed: Signed in printed white ink, front cover lower right: lustig.
inscribed:
Printed vertically in white ink, spine: EXILES. Printed vertically in black ink, spine: JAMES JOYCE; printed horizontally in black ink, spine lower margin within white square: NC 13.

Printed in black ink, upper left center: JAMES JOYCE; printed in white ink, upper left center: exiles.
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Bookjacket design in green and black ink. Front cover depicts three anthropomorphic forms comrpised of black lines surrounded by scribbles in thin white line.
